metadata.title: CVE-2020-35494 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: There's a flaw in binutils /opcodes/tic4x-dis.c. An attacker who is able tosubmit a crafted input file to be processed by binutils could cause usageof uninitialized memory. The highest threat is to application availabilitywith a lower threat to data confidentiality. This flaw affects binutilsversions prior to 2.34.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
